name: Cowhop
description:
Cowhop is the most awaited game from cowbelly studios! A 2D action platformer where you defeat enemies, collect powerups and reach space while vibing!

Features:
- A vast selection of items and powerups!
- Multiplayer game mode so you don't feel lonely!
- Radio loaded with epic Lo-Fi music so you can vibe.
- Amazing pet system cause everyone likes that.
- Lots of skins, so you can be what you want to be!
- Cute monsters that you get to not alive
- Amazing community

Come and join us brother!
